Color Schemes

Description

SCSS

@mixin circle($radius: $gutter * 2) {
  width: $radius;
  height: $radius;
  @include border-radius($radius);
}


/* The text must be inside a <span> */
@mixin circle-with-text($radius) {
  @include circle($radius);
  border: 2px solid;
  
  display: inline-block;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: smaller;

  span {
    position: relative;
    top: $radius / 4; //3
  }
}
